name: confirm(intent:completion:)
desc: Confirms whether you can save the settings to the designated profile.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

           completion: @escaping (INSaveProfileInCarIntentResponse) -> Void)
